Name: Bob Davies
Note: The team was then known as the Rochester Royals.

Name: Maurice Stokes
Note: The team was known as the Rochester Royals through 1955–1957 and moved to Cincinnati starting with the 1957–58 season in which his career was ended by a crippling head injury.

Name: Oscar Robertson
Note: The team was then known as the Cincinnati Royals.

Name: Jack Twyman
Note: The team was known as the Rochester Royals through 1955–1957 and then as the Cincinnati Royals for the remainder of his career.

Name: Sam Lacey
Note: During his career with the team, it was known first as the Cincinnati Royals (1970–1972), then the Kansas City–Omaha Kings (1972–1975), and finally as the Kansas City Kings (1975–1981).

Name: James Silas
Note: In his rookie season (1972–1973), the team was known as the Dallas Chaparrals.

Name: Nate McMillan
Note: Played for the Seattle SuperSonics and served as their head coach (2000–2005).

Name: Lenny Wilkens
Note: Played for the Seattle SuperSonics and served as their head coach (1969–1972; 1977–1985).
